body:
Comment 3 by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
Ok, but on this project[1], I'm using in test files, the package tags followed to
package clause and it works in Linux; in change it fails in BSD systems.

So, having in mind that must be followed by a blank line, it should fail too in Linux
(like in BSD systems).


[1]: https://github.com/kless/validate
